==Dialogue==
===Dialogue Set #1===
''Available before completing ''[[The Dealing Sands]]''.''
{{Dialogue Start}}
:'''Qingye:''' I don't think this outfit I got fits me...
:'''Hongyu:''' Who cares? I got a smelly one and you don't see me complaining!
:'''Hongyu:''' Hurry up! Treasure Hoarder outfits are hard to come by, so don't be so picky!
{{Dialogue End}}

===Dialogue Set #2===
''Available after completing ''The Dealing Sands''.''
{{Dialogue Start}}
:'''Qingye:''' It's my first time doing something like this in someone else's clothes. It feels pretty good. I wouldn't mind doing it again...
:'''Hongyu:''' Something like what? Is there something wrong with you in the head?
:'''Hongyu:''' We only went undercover for a day, and you're addicted already...?
{{Dialogue End}}
